text: aur jis din khuda in logon ko (apanee baaragaah mein) jama karega to goya ye log (samajhegen ki duniya mein) bas ghadee din bhar thahare aur aapas mein ek doosare ko pahachaanenge jin logon ne khuda kee baaragaah mein haazir hone ko jhuthalaaya vah zarur ghaate mein hain aur hidaayat yaaphata na the
